This is a reply from a real person (recruiter Das Menon) about a job opportunity - requires Bill's attention since he needs to provide his availability for a call.

arguments.message: Recruiter Das Menon (Aptuity) tried calling about the PwC Sr .NET Developer role ($70/hr C2C). He's asking for the best time to call you back.
